name: John Morgan's Pedantic Pedestrian House of Trivial Horror
name_original: John Morgan's Pedantic Pedestrian House of Trivial Horror
description:
A Horror/Escape Room/Trivia game made for the PPP Podcast

Designed for gamepad controller, but can be played with WASD keyboard or mouse & keyboard

The game uses Webgl to render, which is CPU dependent.   The game will lag if you have a low end CPU, your GPU and RAM will make no difference.  You can adjust the draw distance in the options if you experience performance issues.

The game is also letterboxed to help with performance.   You can switch to full screen in the options menu.  I might make a widescreen version later.
